turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Martha, could you please order a pizza for me? I'm quite hungry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, of course. I didn't know you liked pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I actually do! It's one of my favorite foods.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, where do you usually get your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Papa John's. I like their food a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, me too!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They are great. Alright, could you order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course. Let me grab my laptop.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Martha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a medium pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sausage and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the spicy italian sausage instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that sounds really good. I'll take that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I changed it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! I love spicy food.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wait, there's a meat lovers pizza. Would you want that instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, not really.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So, you wanted a medium pizza with pepperoni and spicy italian sausage, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep that's the right order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Well the price is going to be $9.53.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have my phone on me!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What's the pizza for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, it's for lunch with a friend. I haven't seen her in a while.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Aw isn't that nice!!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm excited.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, the order's complete and will be done in 25 minutes.
